Package org.sibermatica.util

Class PropertyBundle

java.lang.Object
org.sibermatica.util.PropertyBundle
public final class PropertyBundle extends Object

PropertyBundle

This class is used to store some properties into a "bundle of properties". This class can be used in logging: 
      PropertyBundle pb = new PropertyBundle();
      String text = pb.getString("logging.ERROR_MESSAGE");
      log(text);
In other things: 
     PropertyBundle pb = new PropertyBundle();
     pb.getString("gui.buttons.EXIT");
See Also:
Property
